title: Direct Hit
description:
A platform to spark conversation about various issues surrounding the world of cricket and celebrating our love for the game of cricket, “Direct Hit” is a video podcast hosted and produced by Saumya Mehta, an undergraduate student at Tufts University in Greater Boston.

In each episode, he sits down with some of his friends and fellow cricket enthusiasts to get to the bottom of the recent developments in the cricketing world, share some personal stories encompassing their passion for the game, play some cricket trivia, and also build a lot (read again: a LOT) of ideal XIs.

So come, witness them maneuver their way to some “direct hits” — blunt opinions, sharp takes, and a delightful celebration of their love for the game — and having a free-wheeling, fun-loving, and ever so enjoyable conversation about your favorite sport.

title: The Holy Grail Podcast
description: Just a couple of blokes having a pub chat about all things sport. Covering the cricket, AFL, NRL, NBA and more, grab a froth, take a seat and enjoy some informative and hilarious sporting opinions from Dorey and Parks.

title: Off The Mark
description: Off The Mark is a podcast run by two Melburnian club cricketers with a habitual fear of the short ball featuring news, analysis and debate of the global cricketing scene.

title: Pint Of Sport
description: Discussing all the latest topics from the global sporting world

title: Hot Air Sports Podcast
description: Brought to you by Voicemeat and Blue Sphere Sports Media, the Hot Air Sports Podcast is by Ian McDonald and Aaron Mahon, longtime friends, Liverpool FC fans and all round lovers of sport.

title: The CricBlog Podcast
description: The CricBlog Podcast is hosted by two cricket tragics who are keen to connect with guests from all over the world.

title: Sportzfan Radio
description:
The thinking person's sports show.

The Professor and the panel of the Judge, the Gelding, Coutta, Paul Dalligan, Sarah Radlow and Dan Butterly give their weekly take on all the current issues in sport.

title: Talking Green & Gold
description:
Join Morgan and Stu in the first episode of the 'Talking Green & Gold' podcast!

Just two blokes chatting all things Aussie sports! Footy, basketball, cricket, tennis, MMA, Olympics and much much more!

Weekly episodes of a short, sharp and entertaining podcast containing your favourite segments, used to sum up the week that was in Aussie sports.

title: The Ealing Cricketer
description: The podcast of Ealing Cricket Club, hosted by Mungo Russell and Leigh Parry, covering everything from match day roundups to the 3rd XI's pitch report.

title: Cricket Dummy
description: I'm an American addicted to the sport of cricket. We will make the sport easier to understand for Americans and talk about a sport that is set to explode in the US!

title: The No Run Podcast
description: A podcast for Cricket lovers. Interviews and discussions from a range of people covering different aspects of the game.

title: In The Salmon
description: Sports lovers Nuwan Ranasinghe and Hasith Peiris give you their insight, thoughts and analysis on all the hot topics and latest news happening in the world of cricket

title: The Zatch Sports Podcast
description: The Zatch Sports Podcast, is a podcast where average blokes dribble their knowledge (or lack there of) on Sports across the world including Rugby League, Cricket, NBA and much more covering all the major talking points.

title: The Sports Dome
description:
In this podcast, insights, tactics, personalities and narratives from some of the World's top sports will be discussed - these include Football, Cricket, F1, NBA, Tennis and NFL.

During The Ashes - there will be daily breakdowns analysing day-by-day play.

title: Cricket Casuals
description:
Join the cricket casuals John, Mutz, Aidan and Adam as they discuss all things related to cricket; from technique and strategy to teas and socials.

You can find us on TikTok @cricketcasuals and all of our individual channels below.

Contact us at cricketcasualsuk@gmail.com.

  • John (@cricketumpire86)

  • Mutz (@mysidecricket)

  • Aidan (@alights98)

  • Adam (@feedbuddybatter)

title: The Nothing But Football Show
description: Hi, welcome to our podcast, please feel free to listen and support our channel. Enjoy the podcast!

title: The 8/52 Podcast
description: Botters and Buschy run through all the latest cricket news in Hong Kong.
